titleStmt.title: Campian Englished. Or A translation of the Ten reasons in which Edmund Campian (of the Societie of Iesus) priest, insisted in his challenge, to the Vniuersities of Oxford and Cambridge Made by a priest of the Catholike and Roman Church.
Rationes decem. English
titleStmt.author: Campion, Edmund, Saint, 1540-1581.

publicationStmt.date: Printed with licence. M. DC. XXXII. [1632]

notesStmt.note: A translation, by Laurence Anderton, of: Campion, Edmund. Rationes decem.
